Package com.errigal

Class AddressBook

java.lang.Object
com.errigal.AddressBook
public class AddressBook
extends java.lang.Object
The AddressBook class stores methods used to manipulate data stored in the contacts ArrayList

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.util.ArrayList<Contact> contacts

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addContact​(Contact contact)
    Adds a Contact object to contacts ArrayList
    int contactCounter()
    Returns the length of contacts ArrayList
    void deleteContact​(java.lang.String fullName)
    Deletes a user-specified Contact from the contacts ArrayList via fullName after checking whether a Contact with that name exists.
    Contact getContact​(int index)
    Returns a Contact specified by user
    Contact searchForContact​(java.lang.String fullName)
    Returns an ArrayList of all Full Names sorted by First Name using the FirstNameSorter class which implements Comparator.
    void updateContact​(java.lang.String fullName, java.lang.String fName, java.lang.String lName, java.lang.String phoneNo, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String github, java.lang.String twitter, java.lang.String linkedIn, java.lang.String facebook)
    Updates a user-specified Contact in the contacts ArrayList via fullName after checking whether a Contact with that name exists.
    java.lang.String viewAllContactInfo()
    Returns all Information on all Contact
    java.lang.String viewAllContactNames()
    Returns the Full Names of all Contacts
    java.util.ArrayList<Contact> viewFirstNameSort()
    Returns an ArrayList of all Full Names sorted by First Name using the FirstNameSorter class which implements Comparator.
    java.util.ArrayList<Contact> viewSurnameSort()
    Returns an ArrayList of all Full Names sorted by Surname using the SurnameSorter class which implements the Comparator class.

    • searchForContact

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      foundContact

    • deleteContact

      public void deleteContact​(java.lang.String fullName)
      Deletes a user-specified Contact from the contacts ArrayList via fullName after checking whether a Contact with that name exists.
      Parameters:
      fullName - of Contact to be searched

    • updateContact

      public void updateContact​(java.lang.String fullName, java.lang.String fName, java.lang.String lName, java.lang.String phoneNo, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String github, java.lang.String twitter, java.lang.String linkedIn, java.lang.String facebook)
      Updates a user-specified Contact in the contacts ArrayList via fullName after checking whether a Contact with that name exists.
      Parameters:
      fullName - full name of Contact to be updated
      fName - first name of Contact to be updated
      lName - last name of Contact to be updated
      phoneNo - phone number of Contact to be updated
      email - email address of Contact to be updated
      address - address of Contact to be updated
      github - github username of Contact to be updated
      twitter - twitter username of Contact to be updated
      linkedIn - linkedIn username of Contact to be updated
      facebook - facebook username of Contact to be updated
